long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a recreation of the original 1979 Asteroids. The only difference is that the black and white are switched while also the live/ scores have different visuals. This should be an extension to download because how fun it is and the boredom it can relieve when there is no work to be done.
